data.prayer: There are 709,600 people living in the state of Ica. Only about 102,231 might be believers.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ica, Peru
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Ica, Peru. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, teach the children in the state of Ica to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Ica, Peru to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Yaminahua, Chitonajuas people. Make the Yaminahua, Chitonajuas people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Ica, Peru. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Ica, Peru to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Ica, Peru to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.
